post_detail.description: Recently, we at Click 3X paired up with History Channel on a 'Fit to Make History' campaign sponsored by Miller 64. This time around, our mission was all about capturing speed, and who is more qualified to show off speed than an Olympic runner?    In this vignette, we married both highly stylized live-action moments captured in-house at our studio with History Channel branded animation to create a bold, dramatic story of a record breaking Jamaican sprinter.
post_detail.title: History Channel/Miller 64
